p: The field experiment was conducted at the experimental farm of CSIR-Institute of Himalayan Bioresource Technology, Palampur, India, located at 32°06’05”N latitude, 76°34’10”E longitude and an altitude of 1390 m above mean sea level during 2015–16 and 2016–17. Maximum temperature (14.3 to 30.0°C and 11.6 to 31.9°C), minimum temperature (1.8 to 16.0°C and 1.7 to 19.0°C), relative humidity (22 to 76% and 31 to 68%), and total rainfall 254.8 mm and 373.2 mm) were recorded during both the seasons ( Fig 1).
